title: Network
creator_credit: United Artists, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Sidney Lumet, Theoni V. Aldredge, Fred C. Caruso, Philip Rosenberg, Paddy Chayefsky and Howard Gottfried
brief_description: When veteran anchorman Howard Beale is forced to retire his 25-year post because of his age, he announces to viewers that he will kill himself during his farewell broadcast. Network executives rethink their decision when his fanatical tirade results in a spike in ratings.

constellations_other.name: Newsreel to nightly news
constellations_other.description: For decades, newsreel companies covered the news, providing weekly stories of current events, sport, and entertainment to audiences at the cinema, and establishing the format that would be taken up by television and the nightly news.
